duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform exceptional spa therapies in accordance with the protocols set forth by The Retreat Spa.
Talk with clients about symptoms, medical history and desired results from treatment.
Develop and propose client treatment plan.
Maintain a clean workspace and perform light housekeeping duties between clients and at end of shift.
Promote the Retreat Spa’s other services and products to every member.

education_certification.credential: Valid license in the State of Georgia
